downloadTitle: Developing an end-to-end Windows Store app using JavaScript: Hilo (Windows) - Book Download
downloadDescription: This is a PDF version of the on-line guidance "Developing an end-to-end Windows Store app using JavaScript: Hilo (Windows)"
detailsSection: The JavaScript version of the Hilo photo sample provides guidance to JavaScript developers who want to create a Windows 8 app using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, the Windows Runtime, and modern development patterns. Hilo comes with source code and documentation. This is a PDF version of the on-line guidance "Developing an end-to-end Windows Store app using JavaScript: Hilo (Windows)."
systemRequirementsSection:
• To run the sample described in this document, you need Windows 8.
  • To read the PDF, you will need a document reader capable of displaying PDF format documents.
installInstructionSection:
To read the PDF, you will need a document reader capable of displaying PDF format documents.

The sample code can be found here: Hilo JavaScript sample.
additionalInformationSection:
The sample code can be found here: Hilo JavaScript sample.

The online documentation can be found here: Developing an end-to-end Windows Store app using JavaScript: Hilo (Windows).

For help and support visit the Hilo JavaScript community site.
